overview: Richard Has A Secret. A Secret That Has Shaped His Entire Life. A Secret He Can't Tell To Anyone - Until Now. Richard has been having a hard time, he has been suffering flashbacks of the past, but not in the way that you would think. Richard is about to take Arty on a journey of discovery about an old friend of his, a story full of turmoil, heartbreak and a story which makes Richard question his own position as his friend.
tagline: The Truth Will Always Find The Light
title: Absent Thoughts
